attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

IPS=($(echo "@@{Docker_Swarm_Master.MASTER_IP}@@" | tr "," " "))
TOKEN=($(echo "@@{Docker_Swarm_Master.WORKER_TOKEN}@@" | tr "," " "))

docker swarm join --token ${TOKEN[0]} --advertise-addr @@{INTERNAL_IP}@@ ${IPS[0]}:2377
sleep 5
docker -H ${IPS[0]}:2375 node update --label-add os=linux swarm-slave-@@{calm_array_index}@@

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo yum update --quiet -y
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static swarm-master-@@{calm_array_index}@@

#Install Ntp
sudo yum install --quiet -y ntp 
#sudo ntpdate pool.ntp.org

#Remove any Old docker version
sudo yum remove docker docker-common container-selinux docker-selinux docker-engine

sudo yum install --quiet -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum install --quiet -y docker-ce-@@{DOCKER_VERSION}@@

sudo sed -i '/ExecStart=/c\\ExecStart=/usr/bin/dockerd -H tcp://0.0.0.0:2375 -H unix:///var/run/docker.sock' /usr/lib/systemd/system/docker.service
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo usermod -a -G docker $USER

# -*- Docker storage device mapper configuration
sudo yum install --quiet -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
sudo vgcreate docker /dev/sd{b,c,d}
sleep 3

# -*- Creating docker data and meta volumes
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpool docker -l 95%VG
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpoolmeta docker -l 1%VG
sudo lvconvert -y --zero n -c 512K --thinpool docker/thinpool --poolmetadata docker/thinpoolmeta

echo "activation {
  thin_pool_autoextend_threshold=80
  thin_pool_autoextend_percent=20
}" | sudo tee /etc/lvm/profile/docker-thinpool.profile

sudo lvchange --metadataprofile docker-thinpool docker/thinpool
sudo lvs -o+seg_monitor
sudo mkdir /etc/docker
echo '{
    "storage-driver": "devicemapper",
    "storage-opts": [
    "dm.thinpooldev=/dev/mapper/docker-thinpool",
    "dm.use_deferred_removal=true",
    "dm.use_deferred_deletion=true"
    ]
}' | sudo tee /etc/docker/daemon.json

sudo systemctl restart docker

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -eq 0 ];then
	docker swarm init --advertise-addr @@{address}@@
fi

#!/bin/bash

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi
sleep 10
echo "WORKER_TOKEN=$(docker swarm join-token worker -q)"
echo "MASTER_TOKEN=$(docker swarm join-token manager -q)"
echo "MASTER_IP=@@{address}@@"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -eq 0 ];then
	exit
fi

IPS=($(echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr "," " "))
TOKEN=($(echo "@@{calm_array_MASTER_TOKEN}@@" | tr "," " "))

docker swarm join --token ${TOKEN[0]} --advertise-addr @@{address}@@ ${IPS[0]}:2377
#docker swarm join --token @@{MASTER_TOKEN}@@ --advertise-addr @@{address}@@ ${IPS[0]}:2377
sleep 2
docker -H ${IPS[0]}:2375 node update --label-add os=linux swarm-master-@@{calm_array_index}@@

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

PE_CLUSTER_IP="@@{PE_CLUSTER_IP}@@"
PE_DATASERVICE_IP="@@{PE_DATASERVICE_IP}@@"
PE_PASSWORD="@@{PE_PASSWORD}@@"
PE_USERNAME="@@{PE_USERNAME}@@"
DEFAULT_CONTAINER="@@{DEFAULT_CONTAINER}@@"

if [[ ("${PE_CLUSTER_IP}x" == "x") && ("${PE_DATASERVICE_IP}x" == "x") ]]; then exit 0; fi

sudo yum install -y --quiet iscsi-initiator-utils  
sudo systemd-tmpfiles --create
sudo systemctl start iscsid
sudo systemctl enable iscsid
#ocker plugin install ntnx/nutanix_volume_plugin PRISM_IP="${PE_CLUSTER_IP}" DATASERVICES_IP="${PE_DATASERVICE_IP}" PRISM_PASSWORD="${PE_PASSWORD}" PRISM_USERNAME="${PE_USERNAME}" DEFAULT_CONTAINER="${DEFAULT_CONTAINER}" --alias nutanix --grant-all-permissions

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo yum update --quiet -y
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static swarm-master-@@{calm_array_index}@@

#Install Ntp
sudo yum install --quiet -y ntp 
#sudo ntpdate pool.ntp.org

#Remove any Old docker version
sudo yum remove docker docker-common container-selinux docker-selinux docker-engine

sudo yum install --quiet -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum install --quiet -y docker-ce-@@{DOCKER_VERSION}@@

sudo sed -i '/ExecStart=/c\\ExecStart=/usr/bin/dockerd -H tcp://0.0.0.0:2375 -H unix:///var/run/docker.sock' /usr/lib/systemd/system/docker.service
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo usermod -a -G docker $USER

# -*- Docker storage device mapper configuration
sudo yum install --quiet -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
sudo vgcreate docker /dev/sd{b,c,d}
sleep 3

# -*- Creating docker data and meta volumes
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpool docker -l 95%VG
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpoolmeta docker -l 1%VG
sudo lvconvert -y --zero n -c 512K --thinpool docker/thinpool --poolmetadata docker/thinpoolmeta

echo "activation {
  thin_pool_autoextend_threshold=80
  thin_pool_autoextend_percent=20
}" | sudo tee /etc/lvm/profile/docker-thinpool.profile

sudo lvchange --metadataprofile docker-thinpool docker/thinpool
sudo lvs -o+seg_monitor
sudo mkdir /etc/docker

    "storage-opts": [
    "dm.thinpooldev=/dev/mapper/docker-thinpool",
    "dm.use_deferred_removal=true",
    "dm.use_deferred_deletion=true"
    ]

sudo systemctl restart docker

#NUMBER_OF_NODES=$(echo "@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@" | tr "," "\n" | wc -l)
#NODE_NUMBER=$(($NUMBER_OF_NODES-1))
NODE_NUMBER=@@{calm_array_index}@@

docker -H @@{Docker_Swarm_Master.private_ip_address[0]}@@ node update --availability drain swarm-slave-${NODE_NUMBER}
sleep 3
docker -H @@{Docker_Swarm_Master.private_ip_address[0]}@@ node rm swarm-slave-${NODE_NUMBER} -f

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo yum update --quiet -y
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static swarm-slave-@@{calm_array_index}@@

#Install Ntp
sudo yum install --quiet -y ntp 
sudo ntpdate pool.ntp.org

#Remove any Old docker version
sudo yum remove docker docker-common container-selinux docker-selinux docker-engine

sudo yum install --quiet -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum install --quiet -y docker-ce-@@{DOCKER_VERSION}@@

sudo sed -i '/ExecStart=/c\\ExecStart=/usr/bin/dockerd -H tcp://0.0.0.0:2375 -H unix:///var/run/docker.sock' /usr/lib/systemd/system/docker.service
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo usermod -a -G docker $USER

# -*- Docker storage device mapper configuration
sudo yum install --quiet -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/xvd{b,c,d}
sudo vgcreate docker /dev/xvd{b,c,d}
sleep 3

# -*- Creating docker data and meta volumes
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpool docker -l 95%VG
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpoolmeta docker -l 1%VG
sudo lvconvert -y --zero n -c 512K --thinpool docker/thinpool --poolmetadata docker/thinpoolmeta

echo "activation {
  thin_pool_autoextend_threshold=80
  thin_pool_autoextend_percent=20
}" | sudo tee /etc/lvm/profile/docker-thinpool.profile

sudo lvchange --metadataprofile docker-thinpool docker/thinpool
sudo lvs -o+seg_monitor
sudo mkdir /etc/docker
echo '{
    "storage-driver": "devicemapper",
    "storage-opts": [
    "dm.thinpooldev=/dev/mapper/docker-thinpool",
    "dm.use_deferred_removal=true",
    "dm.use_deferred_deletion=true"
    ]
}' | sudo tee /etc/docker/daemon.json

sudo systemctl restart docker

#script
print "INTERNAL_IP=@@{private_ip_address}@@"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

#NUMBER_OF_NODES=$(echo "@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@" | tr "," "\n" | wc -l)
#NODE_NUMBER=$(($NUMBER_OF_NODES-1))
NODE_NUMBER=@@{calm_array_index}@@

docker -H @@{Docker_Swarm_Master.private_ip_address[0]}@@ node update --availability drain swarm-slave-${NODE_NUMBER}
sleep 3
docker -H @@{Docker_Swarm_Master.private_ip_address[0]}@@ node rm swarm-slave-${NODE_NUMBER} -f

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -eq 0 ];then
	docker swarm init --advertise-addr @@{private_ip_address}@@
fi

#!/bin/bash

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi
sleep 10
echo "WORKER_TOKEN=$(docker swarm join-token worker -q)"
echo "MASTER_TOKEN=$(docker swarm join-token manager -q)"
echo "MASTER_IP=@@{private_ip_address}@@"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -eq 0 ];then
	exit
fi

IPS=($(echo "@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@" | tr "," " "))
TOKEN=($(echo "@@{calm_array_MASTER_TOKEN}@@" | tr "," " "))

docker swarm join --token ${TOKEN[0]} --advertise-addr @@{address}@@ ${IPS[0]}:2377
#docker swarm join --token @@{MASTER_TOKEN}@@ --advertise-addr @@{private_ip_address}@@ ${IPS[0]}:2377
sleep 2
docker -H ${IPS[0]}:2375 node update --label-add os=linux swarm-master-@@{calm_array_index}@@

sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo

sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo usermod -a -G docker $USER

# -*- Docker storage device mapper configuration
sudo yum install --quiet -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}

sleep 3

    "storage-driver": "devicemapper",
    "storage-opts": [
    "dm.thinpooldev=/dev/mapper/docker-thinpool",
    "dm.use_deferred_removal=true",
    "dm.use_deferred_deletion=true"
    ]
}' | sudo tee /etc/docker/daemon.json

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo yum update --quiet -y
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static swarm-master-@@{calm_array_index}@@

#Install Ntp
sudo yum install --quiet -y ntp 
#sudo ntpdate pool.ntp.org

#Remove any Old docker version
sudo yum remove docker docker-common container-selinux docker-selinux docker-engine

sudo yum install --quiet -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum install --quiet -y docker-ce-@@{DOCKER_VERSION}@@

sudo sed -i '/ExecStart=/c\\ExecStart=/usr/bin/dockerd -H tcp://0.0.0.0:2375 -H unix:///var/run/docker.sock' /usr/lib/systemd/system/docker.service
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo usermod -a -G docker $USER

# -*- Docker storage device mapper configuration
sudo yum install --quiet -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
sudo vgcreate docker /dev/sd{b,c,d}
sleep 3

# -*- Creating docker data and meta volumes
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpool docker -l 95%VG
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpoolmeta docker -l 1%VG
sudo lvconvert -y --zero n -c 512K --thinpool docker/thinpool --poolmetadata docker/thinpoolmeta

echo "activation {
  thin_pool_autoextend_threshold=80
  thin_pool_autoextend_percent=20
}" | sudo tee /etc/lvm/profile/docker-thinpool.profile

sudo lvchange --metadataprofile docker-thinpool docker/thinpool
sudo lvs -o+seg_monitor
sudo mkdir /etc/docker
echo '{
    "storage-driver": "devicemapper",
    "storage-opts": [
    "dm.thinpooldev=/dev/mapper/docker-thinpool",
    "dm.use_deferred_removal=true",
    "dm.use_deferred_deletion=true"
    ]
}' | sudo tee /etc/docker/daemon.json

sudo systemctl restart docker

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -eq 0 ];then
	docker swarm init --advertise-addr @@{address}@@
fi

#!/bin/bash

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi
sleep 10
echo "WORKER_TOKEN=$(docker swarm join-token worker -q)"
echo "MASTER_TOKEN=$(docker swarm join-token manager -q)"
echo "MASTER_IP=@@{address}@@"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -eq 0 ];then
	exit
fi

IPS=($(echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr "," " "))
TOKEN=($(echo "@@{calm_array_MASTER_TOKEN}@@" | tr "," " "))

docker swarm join --token ${TOKEN[0]} --advertise-addr @@{address}@@ ${IPS[0]}:2377
#docker swarm join --token @@{MASTER_TOKEN}@@ --advertise-addr @@{address}@@ ${IPS[0]}:2377
sleep 2
docker -H ${IPS[0]}:2375 node update --label-add os=linux swarm-master-@@{calm_array_index}@@

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

PE_CLUSTER_IP="@@{PE_CLUSTER_IP}@@"
PE_DATASERVICE_IP="@@{PE_DATASERVICE_IP}@@"
PE_PASSWORD="@@{PE_PASSWORD}@@"
PE_USERNAME="@@{PE_USERNAME}@@"
DEFAULT_CONTAINER="@@{DEFAULT_CONTAINER}@@"

if [[ ("${PE_CLUSTER_IP}x" == "x") && ("${PE_DATASERVICE_IP}x" == "x") ]]; then exit 0; fi

sudo yum install -y --quiet iscsi-initiator-utils

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo yum update --quiet -y
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static swarm-master-@@{calm_array_index}@@

#Install Ntp
sudo yum install --quiet -y ntp 
#sudo ntpdate pool.ntp.org

#Remove any Old docker version
sudo yum remove docker docker-common container-selinux docker-selinux docker-engine

sudo yum install --quiet -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum install --quiet -y docker-ce-@@{DOCKER_VERSION}@@

sudo sed -i '/ExecStart=/c\\ExecStart=/usr/bin/dockerd -H tcp://0.0.0.0:2375 -H unix:///var/run/docker.sock' /usr/lib/systemd/system/docker.service
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo usermod -a -G docker $USER

# -*- Docker storage device mapper configuration
sudo yum install --quiet -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
sudo vgcreate docker /dev/sd{b,c,d}
sleep 3

# -*- Creating docker data and meta volumes
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpool docker -l 95%VG
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpoolmeta docker -l 1%VG
sudo lvconvert -y --zero n -c 512K --thinpool docker/thinpool --poolmetadata docker/thinpoolmeta

echo "activation {
  thin_pool_autoextend_threshold=80
  thin_pool_autoextend_percent=20
}" | sudo tee /etc/lvm/profile/docker-thinpool.profile

sudo lvchange --metadataprofile docker-thinpool docker/thinpool
sudo lvs -o+seg_monitor
sudo mkdir /etc/docker
echo '{
    "storage-driver": "devicemapper",
    "storage-opts": [
    "dm.thinpooldev=/dev/mapper/docker-thinpool",
    "dm.use_deferred_removal=true",
    "dm.use_deferred_deletion=true"
    ]
}' | sudo tee /etc/docker/daemon.json

sudo systemctl restart docker
